name: NoScales(PesaSenzaBilancia)
0:
”Alexa, open no scales”
”Alexa, ask no scales how much do twenty ounces of flour weigh”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: no scales
des:
The kitchen scale has broken and you don't have a spare at home? No problem!
This Skill allows you to dose the ingredients commonly used in recipes such as Water, Flour, Salt, Rice, etc ... without the aid of a kitchen scale!

It will be enough to use objects that anyone has in the house.

A glass for water, a coffee cup, a table spoon or a teaspoon.
"Weigh without scale" will automatically calculate everything you need to dose your recipes as accurately as possible!

Note: Glass and cup are meant to be full, spoon and teaspoon are meant to be full.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
